WRITING.TITLE: Best time to pop wrinklers?
WRITING.TEXT: I have had my wrinklers on for about 5 days now and I am just wondering when the perfect time to pop them is. I have no real need to pop them now. The next best thing I could buy are the exotic nuts or my first chancemaker.
I have not ascended and I have 51 prestige levels

I have two conflicting opinions aaaaahh. Well, I have already popped them and bought my first chancemaker and a handful of upgrades including the exotic nuts.
Thanks for answering my question lol. Does it matter what stage of the game I'm in or can you do it any stage?

WRITING.TITLE: Stuck trying to get to 333 bil HC
WRITING.TEXT: I'm currently at 134 billion HC and I'm wondering if there are any fast ways to get to 333 billion HC. I do use garden combos (Queenbeets with Elder frenzy and whatnot) which give me around 10 bil each time I do it. Even that is taking a while and I'm just impatient.
Like what? They usually don't help me that much
it annoys me that you havent bought any of those cookie upgrades
a blog post is not really that big of a spoiler. if they have a lot of info in a blog post about ss, then that just shows that ss will have loads more in the actual game.
any new events like the grandmapocalypse?

here's me thinking the game would release in december. I'm really hoping for around a feb-march release. Seeing how long they have worked on this already and with the past experience of hollow knight, it may come sooner than expected but who knows
so good
blabs are pretty common when using force the hand of fate. the only shadow achievement and final achievement I've yet to get is the golden lump one.

WRITING.TITLE: ops
WRITING.TEXT: #8203; https://preview.redd.it/upvmtl8oj6v41.jpg?width=960 amp;format=pjpg amp;auto=webp amp;s=ba831c67e7a04a75fc9c08423c64b22a712d44f8

with the javascript console update, i remember it only being around 3 or 4 days to go from beta to live, but seeing how much of an impact the stock market will have on cookie production, it will most likely be a bit longer, due to orteil stating in the patch notes that it may be altered to stop it from being exploited to much. #8203; i would say give it a week.
they're fairly common in the fthof spell in the grimoire, but a naturally spawning one is extremely rare, nice.

you can grind "sweet" golden cookies, which give you one lump, from the fthof spell. they're still quite rare, but a lot more common than naturally spawning one. i recommend using the fortune cookie add-on ( [https://klattmose.github.io/CookieClicker/FortuneCookie.js](https://klattmose.github.io/CookieClicker/FortuneCookie.js) ) which shows the outcomes of the fthof spell. so what i do is i see if there is a sweet gc coming soon, and if there is, i just use a bunch of spells until i get to it. if there's not, i ascend, which changes the fthof outcomes, and hope for a sweet gc in the fthof spell.
very nice ideas
yes, so if you ascend at 7.7 prestige now, it will double your cps
no, the highest upgrade is only 333 billion, but there are three of them, so basically 1 trillion. A little over 1 trillion is all you need to get all the upgrades
lol
gg
